title: General
fullText:
Generating sets providing supply to safety and essential services to ensure the continuation of the electrical supply to safety and essential services such as fire and smoke control equipment, evacuation equipment and lifts, as outlined in AS/NZS 3000, life preserving equipment, airport safety equipment, airport traffic control and other essential services shall conform with the additional requirements of Clauses 3.5.2 to 3.5.7 and AS/NZS 3000.
NOTE: See Figures 3.1 to 3.4 for typical arrangements.
